text: بَلِ ٱدَّـٰرَكَ عِلۡمُهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ فِي شَكّٖ مِّنۡهَاۖ بَلۡ هُم مِّنۡهَا عَمُونَ

translation.en: Rather, their knowledge is arrested concerning the Hereafter. Rather, they are in doubt about it. Rather, they are, concerning it, blind
translation.id: Bahkan pengetahuan mereka tentang akhirat tidak sampai (ke sana). Bahkan mereka ragu-ragu tentangnya (akhirat). Bahkan mereka buta tentang itu
